title: Microsoft Windows and Office ISO Downol v2.01
description:
This new tool allows an easy and comfortable way to download genuine Windows 7, 8.1 and 10, as well as Office 2007 and 2010 disk images (ISO) directly from Microsoft's servers.

Ever since Microsoft pulled the Windows disk images from Digital River, hunting for untouched ISO files has been a pain. Our new tool will make your life easier, and provides and interface to Microsoft TechBench to download original Windows images directly from Microsoft's server.

As of version 2.00, the tool can also download Microsoft Office.

Release History:

- Added links back to HeiDoc.Net to pages with direct downloads for Office 2013 and Office 2016.

Version: 2.00
Release Date: 26 May 2016
Requirements: .NET Framework 4.6.1, Internet Explorer 11

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Run application and select your version on windows to download
3. Done
